exceptions.exn: Expects a disjunctive pattern with 2 branches.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
aersi: append_entries_reply_sublog_interface
si: sorted_interface

Goal:
forall (n : name) (st : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (src : name) (t : nat) (v : bool), type (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = Leader -> type st = Leader /\ matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = matchIndex st \/ matchIndex (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v) = assoc_set name_eq_dec [] n (maxIndex (log st))

```coq
intros n st src t v H.
pose proof handleRequestVoteReply_matchIndex n st src t v H as HmatchIndex.
destruct HmatchIndex as [Htype [HeqMatchIndex | Hassoc]].
- left. split; assumption.
- right.
  rewrite <- handleRequestVoteReply_same_log with (t := t) (v := v) (src := src) in Hassoc.
  replace (log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v)) with (log st) in Hassoc by apply handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite.
  assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros n st src t v H. pose proof handleRequestVoteReply_matchIndex n st src t v H as HmatchIndex. destruct HmatchIndex as [Htype [HeqMatchIndex | Hassoc]]. - left. split; auto. - right. rewrite <- handleRequestVoteReply_same_log with (t := t) (v := v) (src := src) in Hassoc. replace (log (handleRequestVoteReply n st src t v)) with (log st) in Hassoc by apply handleRequestVoteReply_log_rewrite. auto.
